R

reactivate(String, String) - Method in class be.belgium.eid.eidlib.SmartCard
Reactivates the card by the given two PUK codes.
readBinaryData(int, int, int) - Method in class be.belgium.eid.eidlib.SmartCard
Sends a command to the smart card to read a block of the currently selected file.
readFile(byte[], int) - Method in class be.belgium.eid.eidlib.SmartCard
Reads a file from the smart card and returns the contents of the read file.
RNCertificate - Class in be.belgium.eid.security
The RN certificate is the (National Register) certificate for verifying identities.
RNCertificate(SmartCard) - Constructor for class be.belgium.eid.security.RNCertificate
Initializes the RN certificate.
RootCertificate - Class in be.belgium.eid.security
This class contains the Root certificate which is a certificate for verifying data on a smart card.
RootCertificate(SmartCard) - Constructor for class be.belgium.eid.security.RootCertificate
Initializes the Root certificate by reading it from the given card reader.
RootCertificate(byte[]) - Constructor for class be.belgium.eid.security.RootCertificate
Initializes the root certificate by the given data.
RootVerificationException - Exception in be.belgium.eid.exceptions
The "root verification" exception is thrown when the root certificate of a certain smart card couldn't be verified against the hard coded root certificate.
RootVerificationException() - Constructor for exception be.belgium.eid.exceptions.RootVerificationException
Initializes the root verification exception.
RootVerificationException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception be.belgium.eid.exceptions.RootVerificationException
Initializes the signature verification exception with the given cause of the problem whose raw data couldn't be verified correctly.
run() - Method in class be.belgium.eid.event.CardAlivePromptTask
Repeatably checks whether the card is currently inserted in the card reader and performs actions when the context has been changed.
